name: Little Red Lie
description: A contemporary adventure game about debt, family, and the truth about honesty.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
